markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Instinct Ability](/Feats.aspx?ID=6194) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 176 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Barbarian](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=229)

**Prerequisites**
[Barbarian Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6190)

</column>

---

Your rage stokes the spark of your barbarian instinct into a roaring flame. You gain the instinct ability for the instinct you chose for [Barbarian Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6194).
name: Instinct Ability
